app.title: KrishiMitra
app.subtitle: Smart Soil Analysis for Better Crops

hero.title: Empowering Farmers for Sustainable Agriculture
hero.description: Our mission is to empower farmers with the resources and knowledge they need to grow their crops sustainably and effectively through smart soil analysis.

features.title: How KrishiMitra Works
features.step1Desc: Enter your soil's nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium levels, pH, temperature, humidity, and rainfall data.
features.step2Desc: Our advanced AI analyzes your data and recommends the top 3 most suitable crops for your soil conditions.
features.step3Desc: Get detailed farming guidance, pest control tips, and irrigation schedules through our intelligent chatbot.
features.step4Desc: All recommendations and guidance are provided in your local language for better understanding and implementation.

home.manualEntryDesc: Enter your soil parameters manually for precise crop recommendations.
home.autoDetectDesc: We will use your location and SoilGrids API to automatically fetch soil proportions around you.

result.title: Your Crop Analysis Results
result.subtitle: Comprehensive soil analysis and personalized crop recommendations
result.reportDesc: Based on your soil inputs, here are personalized recommendations tailored for your farm's success.
result.chatCtaDesc: Chat with our AI agricultural expert to get dynamic recommendations.

chatbot.title: Agricultural Expert Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Get personalized farming advice
chatbot.welcomeDesc: I'm your agricultural expert assistant, ready to help you with farming guidance.
